description: A steel flash hider that mounts onto the threading at the muzzle.  While its primary function is to reduce muzzle flash, this model also serves as a mount for the KAC QDSS suppressor.

notes: diameter assumed from a visually-similar flash hider
trim assumes the dips and bumps even each other out
